name: The Giant and the Gnome
description:
A giant and a gnome have joined together to evade human cannibals, solve puzzles, and return home after the long war. Featuring an original score, voice acting, and story sure to make your heart ache. 

CONTROLS

Enter = go to next text bubble (sorry it's a bit slow)

WASD = move

Space = swap control between giant and gnome. Press once to toss out the gnome and control it, then press space again to pull the gnome back to the giant. Enemies can only be defeated if the gnome hits them while traveling back to rejoin the giant!

(We apologize for unskippable text that you have to go through every time you die...git gud we suppose)

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 by Team77:

Team Lead, Design, Programming: Mugenji77

Story / VO: Eamon Kane

Programming: Simon_Winter

Programming: Man_Man

Art & Animation: Bram

Art & Animation: Pixelartchemist

Music: KoBe Lito (Soundcloud)

Publishing: DyQuill
